section.56: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Urwa Al-Bariqi:The Prophet (ï·º) said, "Good will remain (as a permanent quality) in the foreheads of horses (for Jihad) till the Day of Resurrection, for they bring about either a reward (in the Hereafter) or (war) booty (in this world)
